title: Connected
description: The last thing Delilah Preston wanted to do was be a hero, but her conscience wouldn't let her walk away, and now she's caught up in an FBI investigation and the media spotlight. The problem? She's not who she claims to be. Special Agent Dominic Santiago discovers her true identity and realizes she's his ticket to taking down major Underworld crime boss Cap Grimaldi. But Cap is not about to go quietly and devises a plan to not only get his revenge on the Agent, but also get back his errant wife...dead or alive.
author: Kathryn Gayle
